Title: Directs the commissioner of education for the state of New York to revamp the structure of school districts statewide; and to repeal certain provisions of the education law relating thereto
Summary: Directs the commissioner of education for the state of New York to revamp the structure of school districts statewide creating one school district per county.
LawCode: Rpld Title II Arts 33, 35, 37, 39, 51, 52 & 53, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT directing the commissioner of education for the state of New York to revamp the structure of school districts statewide creating one school district per county; and to repeal certain provisions of the education law relating thereto
